The introductory post to this blog.

Hello World

4 February 2018 Revision History

Hello world. It’s been a while.

It’s been even longer if you count from my previous blog.

I’ve meant for a long time to start writing again but every time I’ve tried I’ve been frustrated at the tools available and begun designing my One True Blogging Engine. (Rob calls it my ‘forever project’.)

Micro.blog has changed things. I’m still not entirely happy with my current ‘stack’﻿1 (as it were) but I have things I want to write now. I could do that through Micro.blog itself, of course, but I like to box things (as Amanda would say) and that extends to longer form writing and status updates.

Let’s see how this goes. ✺

  1. Jekyll and GitHub Pages. ↩
